revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Ice Path |image = [[File:Ice Path.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Ice Path. |tokens = 6,000 |location = Between Route 44 and 45, north of Blackthorn City. }} '''Ice Path''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 120,400 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Jynx.png|40px]] Jynx |- | [[File:Swinub.png|40px]] Swinub |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Delibird.png|40px]] Delibird || <center> 440,000 || colspan=3|<center>N/A |}

Requirement |- | align="center" colspan=7| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || 1 || 26.03% || 25.32% || 24.19% || 22.22% || rowspan=3| <center>N/A |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || 1 || 26.03% || 25.32% || 24.19% || 22.22% |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || 1 || 26.03% || 25.32% || 24.19% || 22.22% |- | align="center" colspan=7| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || 1 || 10.42% || 11.07% || 12.08% || 13.86% || rowspan=2| <center>N/A |- | {{Bag2|Purple Shard}} || 1 || 10.42% || 11.07% || 12.08% || 13.86% |- | align="center" colspan=7| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Icicle Plate}} || 1 || 0.35% || 0.56% || 0.89% || 1.48% || rowspan=3| <center>N/A |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || 1 || 0.35% || 0.56% || 0.89% || 1.48% |- | {{Bag2|Never Melt Ice}} || 1 || 0.35% || 0.56% || 0.89% || 1.48% |- | align="center" colspan=7| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Protein}} || 1 || N/A || N/A || N/A || 1.18% || 450 Clears |} The odds are very slightly off due to chances getting redistributed while the requirement locked loot is unavailable. </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> After reaching [[Unova]], the drop chance for items will be [[Dungeons#Dungeon Loot Regional Debuff|debuffed]].
